meanings.definition: A substance derived from amygdalin, used as an alternative cancer treatment.
meanings.sent1: Many people believe that laetrile can help fight cancer naturally.

meanings.sent4: Her positive attitude was like a dose of laetrile, spreading hope and strength to those around her.
meanings.sent5: The image of the sun rising over the mountains was as powerful and healing as laetrile.
